publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2180.1 Robert Brown: Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2180) in the name of Patrick Harvie, leave out from first “believes” to end and insert “applauds his long stand for peace and human rights in the Middle East; deplores the harassment that he continues to suffer at the hands of the Israeli authorities; welcomes recent moves towards detente and withdrawal from the Palestinian Occupied Territories; urges Her Majesty’s Government to do all in its power to help secure a peaceful Middle East based on vindication of individual human rights across the region and on full recognition of democratic and independent Israeli and Palestinian states, and calls on Her Majesty’s Government to press the Israeli Government to allow Mordechai Vanunu to leave Israel and be inaugurated as Glasgow University Rector.” Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-2180.1 Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu (lodged on 11 January 2005) Ms Wendy Alexander*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Butler*, Mike Rumbles*, Jeremy Purvis*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-2180.1 Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu (lodged on 11 January 2005) Dr Elaine Murray*

S2M-2180.1 Robert Brown: Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2180) in the name of Patrick Harvie, leave out from first "believes" to end and insert "applauds his long stand for peace and human rights in the Middle East; deplores the harassment that he continues to suffer at the hands of the Israeli authorities; welcomes recent moves towards detente and withdrawal from the Palestinian Occupied Territories; urges Her Majesty’s Government to do all in its power to help secure a peaceful Middle East based on vindication of individual human rights across the region and on full recognition of democratic and independent Israeli and Palestinian states, and calls on Her Majesty’s Government to press the Israeli Government to allow Mordechai Vanunu to leave Israel and be inaugurated as Glasgow University Rector." Supported by: Ms Wendy Alexander, Jackie Baillie, Bill Butler, Mike Rumbles, Jeremy Purvis, Mike Pringle, Dr Elaine Murray
S2M-2180.1 Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu (lodged on 11 January 2005) Pauline McNeill*, Margaret Jamieson*, Karen Whitefield*, Des McNulty*
S2M-2180.1 Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu (lodged on 11 January 2005) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-2180.1 Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu (lodged on 11 January 2005) Dr Jean Turner*, Karen Gillon*
S2M-2180.1 Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu (lodged on 11 January 2005) Mr Frank McAveety*, Mike Watson*
S2M-2180.1 Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu (lodged on 11 January 2005) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-2180.1 Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu (lodged on 11 January 2005) Sarah Boyack*
S2M-2180.1 Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu (lodged on 11 January 2005) Mr John Home Robertson*
S2M-2180.1 Congratulations to Mordechai Vanunu (lodged on 11 January 2005) Susan Deacon* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
